name: Unnanounced Project - Scubalight Studios
description: I've been working on a multiplayer game since may 2024, adding new gameplay features and creating the backend infrastructure.

name: Madden NFL - Electronic Arts
description: Worked on this game as a UI Game developer. Implemented entirely screens that are used by millions of players

name: 0xMen - Rather Labs
description: WebGL NFT Game I developed from scratch, including core gameplay mechanics, multiplayer and AI features. Created an engine for characters creating automation.

name: Rhythm Realms - Agonalea Games
description: I Led the "Google Indie Games Fund Award" winning game team for 2 years. Created core rhythmic mechanics, lootboxes, inventory and season pass features.

name: Jumping Hamster - Deliver Games
description: A Doodle Jump-like Game, for PC Windows and Linux. Developed in Godot 3 in 2018.

name: Argentina Pelea - Debate Mortal - Deliver Games
description: A parody game of Argentine politicians. Developed with Unity3D.

name: Eggszy - Deliver Games
description: Android Game developed in 2017 with Unity3D. I remastered this game in 2020, adding to it some cool features, like a skins system, ads, in app purchases
